customApps.name: OIC Pipeline
customApps.description: This app manages OIC artefacts (Integrations, Packages, Lookups), manages and control an developer pipeline across various enviroments, has an auto backup feature that can navigate in time and has a set of useful reports, like integration audit, scheduled details, etc.
customApps.author: Felipe Piovezan

customApps.name: OCC Pipeline
customApps.description: This app manages Oracle Cloud Commerce artefacts and has a set of useful reports, like audit, change details, etc.
customApps.author: Felipe Piovezan
